description: Start with the prime 11; next prime must exceed previous prime and start with last digit of previous prime.
prog: (PARI) nxtprm(fp) = {fd = digits(fp); ld = fd[#fd]; forprime(p = fp+1,,nd = digits(p); if ((nd[1] == ld) , return (p)));}lista(nn) = {fp = 1; for (n=1, nn, np = nxtprm(fp); print1(np, ", "); fp = np;);}
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Feb 15 2000
